title: Mobile-Based Short-Intensive Course for Strengthening Adolescents' Financial Management Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic financial terminology and budget management concepts
context.additional_context: Financial management habit formation through real-life scenario-based learning in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more financial decision-making strategies in everyday life scenarios (e.g., monthly salary management, student loan planning).
Learners can perform monthly budget allocation simulations using mobile apps and analyze the results.
Learners can understand financial risk management principles (savings, investments, insurance) and explain priorities based on situational contexts.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
